VerilogWriter Document

Brief Introduction

If you have IJulia locally, execute

using VerilogWriter

and then

In[1]
y = @always (
    dout = d1 + d2;
    if b1
        dout = ~d1
    elseif b2 
        dout = ~d2
    end
)
vshow(y)

and now you get the following:

Out[1]
always_comb begin
    dout = (d1 + d2);
    if (b1) begin
        dout = ~d1;
    end else if (b2) begin
        dout = ~d2;
    end
end
type: VerilogWriter.Alwayscontent
